SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.berezin.graph

Interface Graph<T,NodeIndex>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of data stored in nodes
NodeIndex - Type of index for nodes
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjListGraph, AdjMatrixGraph, IncMatrixGraph
public interface Graph<T,NodeIndex>
Collection of nodes connected by edges. Each node can store a data. Nodes and edges are indexed.

  • Method Details

    • addNode

      NodeIndex addNode(T data) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a node to the graph.
      Parameters:
      data - Data to store in the node
      Returns:
      Index of the new node
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if argument is null

    • getNode

      T getNode(NodeIndex id)
      Returns data of a node.
      Parameters:
      id - Index of the node
      Returns:
      Data of the node.

    • removeNode

      T removeNode(NodeIndex id)
      Removes a node from the graph. All edges connected to the node will be removed as well. Node index would be invalid after this operation and sholud not be used. If invalid index used, methods that were invoked may or may not return invalid result and may or may not throw an undocumented exception.
      Parameters:
      id - Index of the node to remove
      Returns:
      Data of removed node. Empty if node was not found in the graph.

    • nodes

      Iterable<NodeIndex> nodes()
      Iterates over all nodes in the graph.
      Returns:
      Iterator over all nodes in the graph

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(NodeIndex from, NodeIndex to, int weight)
      Adds an edge between two nodes.
      Parameters:
      from - Edge from this node
      to - Edge to this node
      weight - Weight of nodes

    • getEdges

      Iterable<Integer> getEdges(NodeIndex from, NodeIndex to)
      Get weight of all edges between two nodes.
      Parameters:
      from - Edge from this node
      to - Edge to this node
      Returns:
      Iterator over all weights of edges between two nodes

    • retainEdges

      void retainEdges(NodeIndex from, NodeIndex to, Predicate<Integer> predicate)
      Iterates over all edges between two nodes that satisfy the predicate.
      Parameters:
      from - Edge from this node
      to - Edge to this node
      predicate - Removes

    • neighbors

      Iterable<NodeIndex> neighbors(NodeIndex id)
      Neighbors of a node.
      Parameters:
      id - Index of the node
      Returns:
      List of neighbors of the node

    • reserveNodes

      static <Nt, Nindex> Graph<Nt,Nindex> reserveNodes(int amount)
      Returns this graph with enouth memory to hold amount nodes. No nodes have been inserted in the graph yet. It is safe to cast resulting type to the type of graph.
      Parameters:
      amount - resulting graph has enough capasity to hold this many nodes.
